programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton makes a trip to South Carolina to fish Lake Murray. He meets up with the Rather Outdoors crew to spend time on the water and at the Rather HQ checking out all the gear from Lews and Strike King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew is chasing Tarpon in Tampa Florida with Ryan Harrington. After a few close calls and grinding out the long days, they finally catch up to the Silver King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Southards continue their family tradition on Table Rock Lake. While they’re there, Trenton spends a day with “Mr. Worldwide” James Watson and learns some things from one of the best anglers on the lake.

programme.title: saltwater experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor catch two thirds of a slam when they bring Tom’s new Yellowfin 24’ Bay up to Key Largo for some exciting flats fishing.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: After a successful morning of baby tarpon fishing, Captains Tom Rowland, Rich Tudor and Mason Baker slide over to the legendary downtown Islamorada flats to check on the resurgence of Florida Keys bonefish.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor head into the Everglades backcountry out of Key Largo to fish the shallow grass flats for tailing redfish.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Saltwater Experience Charters’ Captain Garrett Stephens for a trip into the Gulf. When their catches get repeatedly cut off, they decide to bring the massive bull sharks up to the surface for a closer look.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: After wrestling with some massive bull sharks, Captains Tom Rowland, Rich Tudor and guest Captain Garrett Stephens encounter some crazy cobia action and it takes all their strength and skill to keep them away from the sharks.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Everybody is always fighting about does. Should you shoot them? Should you not? Well the teams explains why you're all probably right and wrong in this episode of Deer & Deer Hunting TV.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: It's lean, delicious, savory and the best part of the hunt. In this episode of Deer and Deer Hunting, Dan Schmidt, Mark Kayser and Brad Fenson share with us their thoughts on the other red meat, venison.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: There's nothing in the world like waking up and hitting the Sweet November woods. That said, make sure you're applying the right hunting tactics for the right time of year.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Hunting the late season is just as exciting as hunting during the rut. As a hunter you have the opportunity to better understand a whitetails needs now that winter has come. In this episode Mark Kayser attempts to fill his Iowa buck tag in December.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Part II of our exclusive profile of the current state of hunting in America and whether or not we believe there is light at the end of the tunnel.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: There's no doubt that social media has provided the hunting community a platform for expansion and a place within today's technological society, but can hunters go too far with their posts and potentially harm the community we all love?

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The second split is here, and the crew decides to try their luck at historic Old Hickory in Lacour, Louisiana. Ducks, deer, and mouth-watering meals are all on the menu.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: In this episode the DCD crew heads to the lesser-known but highly productive Red River in Western Louisiana. Despite a slow start to the season, the Red River provides some of the best hunting yet. With mixed bags of woodies, greenheads, and teal. Not to mention a handful of bonus squirrels and wild mushrooms. Shoot straight and come hungry.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Duck hunting in Louisiana is as much about its history as it is about its future. In the season's final days, Jean-Paul learns about Louisiana’s rich waterfowling history, dives into conservation projects throughout the state, and returns to Bayou Black for one last ride. Shoot straight and come hungry because it's the last hunt of the season.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Danny heads back to his hometown for the first time in his adult life hoping to make some quick connections with his salty roots.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of fishing in the enchanting waters of the Everglades alongside the renowned Captain Danny Allen and Captain Leiza Fitzgerald. Embark on an unforgettable journey through the intricate maze of mangroves, expansive marshes, and shimmering backwaters, as these expert guides lead you to some of the most coveted fishing spots in the region.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Join Captain Danny Allen and Dan Benson from Power-Pole as they embark on an exciting fishing expedition in Cortez, Florida, in the latest installment of Beyond The Surface TV. Witness their relentless pursuit of fish as they adapt to the ever-changing conditions. Don't make the mistake of skipping this captivating episode – it's bound to leave you hooked!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Captain Danny Allen and Captain Bill Pitman are two seasoned fishermen who share an unyielding passion for the art of angling. Their extraordinary skills and deep love for the sea have led them to the breathtaking waters of Fernandina Beach , a hidden gem known for its abundant marine life and picturesque surroundings.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring aquatic journey as "Legendary Pursuits: Conquering the Depths of Port Saint Joe" takes you on an epic fishing adventure like no other. Join us as we cast off into the pristine waters of Port Saint Joe, a coastal paradise brimming with marine treasures waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Dive into the exhilarating world of tarpon fishing in the historic city of St. Augustine, Florida. Join Capt. Danny as henavigates the timeless waters of the oldest city in Florida, seeking the mighty tarpon. These fish will test your angling skills and endurance.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In most cases, the cameraman or woman hunts as well… Often their “play time” happens between scheduled season hunts for the show. But why don’t we see those? This year, I made it a point to film all of my camera girl’s hunts and decided to make an episode out of it. Without help, none of this possible! So to all the camera operators, behind the scenes industry folks… Thank you and this is for you!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode we kick off with calling in a bird for the Bellator Light Heavyweight Champ, Corey Anderson on a farm in Kentucky. We roll up to Ohio and double up on a foggy morning, then it was back to Iowa where John linked up with Skyline Motorsports Crew Chief of the #16 Longhorn, Zeb to chase birds in NE Iowa. Another double to close out the season! 5 turkeys in the episode, Enjoy!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John competes in another Tactical Games event in Pennsylvania and a Total Archery Challenge. If you’re not familiar with these…. The Tactical Games is a cross fit meets 2 Gun style competition. The TAC events are a big Archery 3D fun shoot with targets ranging from 15 to 120 yds! If you’ve never done one of these, DO IT!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Usually my summers are filled with trail cameras, food plots, and prepping for the whitetail season. This year I actually got ahead of the game and was able to carve out a week to go try some new hunting…. Bowfishing! I love to shoot bows and I love to fish, why not do them both at the same time?! It took awhile to get dialed in, but once I learned the refraction of the water & lights, thing heat up fast!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John travels to Arizona at the end of June for an OTC Rifle Elk hunt! This rare opportunity due to Arizona opening a summer tag on private and state land allows non residents to obtain a chance at a velvet bull! High temps and high anticipation are filled with this hunt!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: John heads back to Kentucky once again!! After moving away in 2016, John hasn’t connected on a KY buck since! If it could go wrong, it went wrong! But, optimism is high this year on a new piece of property his buddy from high school just bought! Short window to get this hunt in before the western swing kicks in too! Can he get it done and break the bad luck?

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel with John back to Colorado. A familiar spot where he has tagged out before on Mule Deer with a bow. Back for the third year as he tries to keep the streak going! Several stalks go out the window before he closes in on a target buck at 44 yds! Will he keep the luck on his side?

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring aquatic journey as "Legendary Pursuits: Conquering the Depths of Port Saint Joe" takes you on an epic fishing adventure like no other. Join us as we cast off into the pristine waters of Port Saint Joe, a coastal paradise brimming with marine treasures waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: When overnight temps go low and the tides go lower, it forces Redfish to move. Justin & Travis break out a new micro skiff to see how low they can go to ambush shifting redfish on the flats.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nikki Boxler’s life in Update New York on her family farm raising cattle and producing maple syrup is a few thousand miles from the hills of New Mexico. We’ll take a look into Nikki’s life back home and then follow along as she visits the small town of Quemado and its bustling population of 228, while she pursues bugling elk with her favorite Winchester in hand. We’ll also head to Missouri and Texas to chase whitetails with Chris Keefer and Paul Sawyer.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode Slade gets very busy in the real estate world. But lucky for him, Caleb Armstrong takes up the slack. Caleb sets out to hunt swamp bucks on the public land of Tensas Parish.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade goes over what he’s doing at his home property to create summer food plots for deer, and gives tips to those looking to do the same. On the final hunt for the 2024 season, Lori gets a big Wilkinson County gobbler.
After filming his son kill his first 200″ monster, Kris Seymour chases big bucks in Kansas, Oklahoma and Canada.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Randy, Dustin and Cody are finishing up food plots when they run into a huge problem with army worms but first they are doing some wheeling and dealing on a new rut hut for The Raven.

programme.title: The Raven Project - "The Buck Plot"
programme.desc: With the Buck Plot starting to turn on Randy has an encounter with a big ten they haven't seen before.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: Michael Pitts is joined by competition caller and call-maker Anthony Virga, as well as Cole Barthel. It's the first hunt of the year for the Realtree Road Trips crew.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Part of our North Dakota crew joins us in Illinois to shoot green heads in The Land of Lincoln.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Zach and Carson Wentz head to Texas for their annual hunt with the Nature’s Eye crew.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Hunting wild hogs at night with thermal optics is a unique thrill. But even in prime pig country, catching up with night swine can be a serious challenge. Feral hogs are cagey and unpredictable—they read no scripts—and they'll definitely keep you on the edge of your seat as you wait for the perfect opportunity to make bacon.

programme.title: HuntStand TIps and Gear
programme.desc: With dozens of models up for grabs, what do you need to think about to choose the best new crossbow? This quick guide will get you on a path to crossbow confidence.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.desc: Kyle Barefield and Cole Barthel from All Things Hunting head to the Rocky Mountains with Browning Rifles in hand after “Wapiti” the Native American Term meaning “White Rump” referring to Elk.

programme.title: Working Class Hunter
programme.desc: After her first turkey, Kristy is ready for her next challenge—a buck on her own land. With her husband by her side, she experiences the thrill of her first antlered deer. Emotions run high, and this hunt is one she’ll never forget. Experience the joy of her success with her!

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: Outdoor writer Brad Fenson comes back to the Sand Hills of Nebraska to pursue big bucks.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike tries heavy mat flippin’ for the first time. Fishing with pro bass angler Robbie Crosnoe.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: In this episode of Reel Animals Mike is fishing in Louisiana for the infamous Bull Red!

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike Heads over to Bartow to chase ditch pickles with his good friends from Bartow Ford.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike Anderson is fishing in the Florida Keys for Tarpon" on this episode of Reel Animals that takes viewers on an unforgettable journey into the heart of the Florida Keys, renowned worldwide for its pristine waters and abundant marine life.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Get ready to embark on an exhilarating fishing expedition as Mike Anderson, the renowned host of Reel Animals TV, teams up with two dynamic and skilled female captains, Katie Jo and Lezia Fitzgerald, on the stunning Nature Coast of Florida.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Embark on an epic journey into the world of legendary snook fishing with 'Legendary Snook Chronicles: Captain Mike Anderson's Reel Odyssey.' Join the seasoned angler, Captain Mike Anderson, as he takes you on an adrenaline-pumping adventure through the waters, revealing the secrets of reeling in these elusive giants.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: In the Pilot episode of Goin’ Coastal High School sweethearts Josh and Anna Calhoon hit their local waters of Ft. Walton Beach, FL and show off the diversity of the Estuary.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and good friend as well as fellow guide, Josh Nelson hit the beach for some stud Redfish. They also met with Alex Fogg (Coastal resource manager) for a redfish release with the CCA.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Alex Fogg The Coastal Resource Manager of Destin / Ft. Walton beach fish some of the artificial reefs that have been deployed over the past 20 years.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Anna set out for a last minute fishing trip that runs a little late. They take a quick detour to the parent pick up line to get the kids from school, and head back out on the water to see what’s biting!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh takes his friend Isaiah to the blue water as they look for destin's latest hot bite, the blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and George from Two Georges Marina battle the wind and tide on a tough day of fishing which leads Josh to fish another day, solely for revenge on the Sheepshead!

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Escape to the beautiful shores of Grand Isle, Louisiana where musician and community advocate David St. Romain joins Chef Jay Ducote for a weekend of fishing, crabbing, and oyster harvesting. Watch as Chef Mark Boudreaux of Hurricane Hole transforms their fresh catch into a culinary feast. Enjoy the thrill of fishing, the joy of cooking and the camaraderie of camp in The Bayou State.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Cajun classics are met with a Zimbabwean flair in this delicious mashup of cultures. Join Chef Jay Ducote and Food Network Star Rue Lindsay as they take on the fishing village of Cocodrie, Louisiana. Guided by Captain Zach LeBeouf, this tasty adventure will surely leave you hankering for more.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Join us at Pelican’s Roost in Delacroix, LA, where Captain Sean Thornton and Chef Jay Ducote were able to share the full Louisiana Catch & Cook experience with Texas Food Personality Trey “Chow Down” Chapman—with delicious results.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Follow the DCD crew as they head North to hunt with duck call maker Brad Eldrige. Despite tough hunting conditions brought on by a historic drought in Louisiana, the crew is able to knock down a “Tensas Limit” of wood ducks, mallards, honkers, and squirrels.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The Duck Camp Dinners crew leaves the bayous and heads down river to Venice, Louisiana where they prepare for their first duck hunt in the delta.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts begins the process of weaning and tagging fawns. Valor, an abandoned fawn lives through a horrible sickness and is released back to the herd. The new residence will receive their ear tags and begin adulthood.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts continues to wean and tag fawns. Arriving in the barn with their does and fawns, is a 200 inch named Bruce. A 7x7 typical that is Doug Roberts best whitetail he has raised in 26 years.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: SCI Flint Chapter Wish hunt is happening with 2 kids at High Rack Ranch of Michigan. Follow the story of Tyler and Carson as they take their dads hunting and hunt their first whitetail

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Antlers on ConQuest deer farm must be removed to ensure the safety of bucks fighting and killing each other. Watch how Doug Roberts selects only the best typical bucks for his breeding program.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts takes his knee surgeon hunting at High Rack Ranch of Michigan, from pheasant hunting to big whitetails. Doug Roberts decides to take the advice of his doctor and schedule surgery for his second knee replacement.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Collecting semen from breeder bucks only happens when Doug has found the perfect typical whitetail. A 7x7 named Bruce, son of Die Hard is being collected.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: The Montana adventure continues on private lakes targeting trophy trout. This is where fish stories are born.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny meets up with Jeff Coffee of ZOE angling group to talk shop, tie flies and fish in one of the most biodiverse lakes in the country.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny meets up with Chef Dave in the Golden Ilse to target Reds and Trout. Then head to Halyards to cook the catch.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny tries his hand at the seine net to catch some shrimp. Then meets up with Chef Dave to cook up some amazing Shrimp and Grits. After, Travel to Jekyll Island for the Shrimp and Grits Festival.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: There is a place in Florida that not many people have heard about. The Forgotten Coast, Ever heard of it? Didn’t think so. Let’s discover it together.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: No, we aren’t talking about a hair dew. Danny hangs out with some amazing people that commercial fish for Florida gold.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon Simmons meets up with South Florida guide Debbie Hanson and they search the Everglades for Peackock Bass in their Pelican Kayaks. They jump onboard an airboat to get deeper into the Florida backwaters.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon Simmons meets up with South Florida guide Debbie Hanson and they search the Everglades for Peackock Bass in their Pelican Kayaks. They jump onboard an airboat to get deeper into the Florida backwaters.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon Simmons explores the Ft Lauderdale area. Visiting Pompano Beach Fishing Pier, Kayak fishing the canals and running the inlets for Snook

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon Simmons meets up with the legendary Guy Harvey to go fishing off the blue waters of Ft. Lauderdale.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoors
programme.desc: Blair fishes the flats of the Florida Space Coast with Capt. Jon Lulay.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Blair & Capt. John Beach are at it again, in Crystal River catching some great snook right off the mouth of the river.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton meets up with Tom Brewbaker as they fly down to Venice Louisiana to fish with Mike Frenette. Mike runs the Redfish Lodge of Louisiana and has over forty years of angling experience. Mike teaches the guys about the local waters including pogey boats and most importantly, world class red fish.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: In Stomping Grounds Episode 5, our crew follows the road all the way down to where it ends on the tropical sun-baked island of Key West at the southern tip of the Florida Keys. Surrounded by water, Key West is a boater's paradise with historic seaports and marinas offering a bustling waterfront with historic schooners, dive boats, sport fishing charters, parasailing adventures and scenic coastal excursions. Host Ryan McVinney hops aboard a custom hybrid diesel-electric power catamaran with solar panels, called "Squid" for an in-depth eco-tour of Key West National Wildlife Refuge, including snorkeling in a sponge garden with tropical fish. Next a quick stop in Dry Tortugas National Park via the 110-foot Gladding Hearn power catamaran the "Yankee Freedom III" to visit historic Fort Jefferson, then we jump on a 2020 Sea Hunt 255 Ultra for a ride through the dolphin playground to a secret local boating spot known as Snipe Keys with pristine white sandbars. Back in town we we board the Nau Santa Maria - a replica of Christopher Columbus' sailboat. Finally we head 50 miles offshore to ply the wakes of the shrimp boats with fishing charter captain Chris Trosset aboard his Contender 35ST center console boat.

programme.desc: The Primos Team hunts giant elk in the prairies and mountains of New Mexico.

programme.desc: Dive into the exhilarating world of tarpon fishing in the historic city of St. Augustine, Florida. Join Capt. Danny as henavigates the timeless waters of the oldest city in Florida, seeking the mighty tarpon. These fish will test your angling skills and endurance.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In most cases, the cameraman or woman hunts as well… Often their “play time” happens between scheduled season hunts for the show. But why don’t we see those? This year, I made it a point to film all of my camera girl’s hunts and decided to make an episode out of it. Without help, none of this possible! So to all the camera operators, behind the scenes industry folks… Thank you and this is for you!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode we kick off with calling in a bird for the Bellator Light Heavyweight Champ, Corey Anderson on a farm in Kentucky. We roll up to Ohio and double up on a foggy morning, then it was back to Iowa where John linked up with Skyline Motorsports Crew Chief of the #16 Longhorn, Zeb to chase birds in NE Iowa. Another double to close out the season! 5 turkeys in the episode, Enjoy!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John competes in another Tactical Games event in Pennsylvania and a Total Archery Challenge. If you’re not familiar with these…. The Tactical Games is a cross fit meets 2 Gun style competition. The TAC events are a big Archery 3D fun shoot with targets ranging from 15 to 120 yds! If you’ve never done one of these, DO IT!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Usually my summers are filled with trail cameras, food plots, and prepping for the whitetail season. This year I actually got ahead of the game and was able to carve out a week to go try some new hunting…. Bowfishing! I love to shoot bows and I love to fish, why not do them both at the same time?! It took awhile to get dialed in, but once I learned the refraction of the water & lights, thing heat up fast!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John travels to Arizona at the end of June for an OTC Rifle Elk hunt! This rare opportunity due to Arizona opening a summer tag on private and state land allows non residents to obtain a chance at a velvet bull! High temps and high anticipation are filled with this hunt!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: John heads back to Kentucky once again!! After moving away in 2016, John hasn’t connected on a KY buck since! If it could go wrong, it went wrong! But, optimism is high this year on a new piece of property his buddy from high school just bought! Short window to get this hunt in before the western swing kicks in too! Can he get it done and break the bad luck?

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel with John back to Colorado. A familiar spot where he has tagged out before on Mule Deer with a bow. Back for the third year as he tries to keep the streak going! Several stalks go out the window before he closes in on a target buck at 44 yds! Will he keep the luck on his side?

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring aquatic journey as "Legendary Pursuits: Conquering the Depths of Port Saint Joe" takes you on an epic fishing adventure like no other. Join us as we cast off into the pristine waters of Port Saint Joe, a coastal paradise brimming with marine treasures waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: When overnight temps go low and the tides go lower, it forces Redfish to move. Justin & Travis break out a new micro skiff to see how low they can go to ambush shifting redfish on the flats.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nikki Boxler’s life in Update New York on her family farm raising cattle and producing maple syrup is a few thousand miles from the hills of New Mexico. We’ll take a look into Nikki’s life back home and then follow along as she visits the small town of Quemado and its bustling population of 228, while she pursues bugling elk with her favorite Winchester in hand. We’ll also head to Missouri and Texas to chase whitetails with Chris Keefer and Paul Sawyer.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode Slade gets very busy in the real estate world. But lucky for him, Caleb Armstrong takes up the slack. Caleb sets out to hunt swamp bucks on the public land of Tensas Parish.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade goes over what he’s doing at his home property to create summer food plots for deer, and gives tips to those looking to do the same. On the final hunt for the 2024 season, Lori gets a big Wilkinson County gobbler.
After filming his son kill his first 200″ monster, Kris Seymour chases big bucks in Kansas, Oklahoma and Canada.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Randy, Dustin and Cody are finishing up food plots when they run into a huge problem with army worms but first they are doing some wheeling and dealing on a new rut hut for The Raven.

programme.title: The Raven Project - "The Buck Plot"
programme.desc: With the Buck Plot starting to turn on Randy has an encounter with a big ten they haven't seen before.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: Michael Pitts is joined by competition caller and call-maker Anthony Virga, as well as Cole Barthel. It's the first hunt of the year for the Realtree Road Trips crew.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Part of our North Dakota crew joins us in Illinois to shoot green heads in The Land of Lincoln.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Zach and Carson Wentz head to Texas for their annual hunt with the Nature’s Eye crew.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Hunting wild hogs at night with thermal optics is a unique thrill. But even in prime pig country, catching up with night swine can be a serious challenge. Feral hogs are cagey and unpredictable—they read no scripts—and they'll definitely keep you on the edge of your seat as you wait for the perfect opportunity to make bacon.

programme.title: HuntStand TIps and Gear
programme.desc: With dozens of models up for grabs, what do you need to think about to choose the best new crossbow? This quick guide will get you on a path to crossbow confidence.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.desc: Kyle Barefield and Cole Barthel from All Things Hunting head to the Rocky Mountains with Browning Rifles in hand after “Wapiti” the Native American Term meaning “White Rump” referring to Elk.

programme.title: Working Class Hunter
programme.desc: After her first turkey, Kristy is ready for her next challenge—a buck on her own land. With her husband by her side, she experiences the thrill of her first antlered deer. Emotions run high, and this hunt is one she’ll never forget. Experience the joy of her success with her!

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: Outdoor writer Brad Fenson comes back to the Sand Hills of Nebraska to pursue big bucks.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike tries heavy mat flippin’ for the first time. Fishing with pro bass angler Robbie Crosnoe.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: In this episode of Reel Animals Mike is fishing in Louisiana for the infamous Bull Red!

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike Heads over to Bartow to chase ditch pickles with his good friends from Bartow Ford.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike Anderson is fishing in the Florida Keys for Tarpon" on this episode of Reel Animals that takes viewers on an unforgettable journey into the heart of the Florida Keys, renowned worldwide for its pristine waters and abundant marine life.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Get ready to embark on an exhilarating fishing expedition as Mike Anderson, the renowned host of Reel Animals TV, teams up with two dynamic and skilled female captains, Katie Jo and Lezia Fitzgerald, on the stunning Nature Coast of Florida.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Embark on an epic journey into the world of legendary snook fishing with 'Legendary Snook Chronicles: Captain Mike Anderson's Reel Odyssey.' Join the seasoned angler, Captain Mike Anderson, as he takes you on an adrenaline-pumping adventure through the waters, revealing the secrets of reeling in these elusive giants.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: In the Pilot episode of Goin’ Coastal High School sweethearts Josh and Anna Calhoon hit their local waters of Ft. Walton Beach, FL and show off the diversity of the Estuary.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and good friend as well as fellow guide, Josh Nelson hit the beach for some stud Redfish. They also met with Alex Fogg (Coastal resource manager) for a redfish release with the CCA.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Alex Fogg The Coastal Resource Manager of Destin / Ft. Walton beach fish some of the artificial reefs that have been deployed over the past 20 years.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Anna set out for a last minute fishing trip that runs a little late. They take a quick detour to the parent pick up line to get the kids from school, and head back out on the water to see what’s biting!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh takes his friend Isaiah to the blue water as they look for destin's latest hot bite, the blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and George from Two Georges Marina battle the wind and tide on a tough day of fishing which leads Josh to fish another day, solely for revenge on the Sheepshead!

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Escape to the beautiful shores of Grand Isle, Louisiana where musician and community advocate David St. Romain joins Chef Jay Ducote for a weekend of fishing, crabbing, and oyster harvesting. Watch as Chef Mark Boudreaux of Hurricane Hole transforms their fresh catch into a culinary feast. Enjoy the thrill of fishing, the joy of cooking and the camaraderie of camp in The Bayou State.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Cajun classics are met with a Zimbabwean flair in this delicious mashup of cultures. Join Chef Jay Ducote and Food Network Star Rue Lindsay as they take on the fishing village of Cocodrie, Louisiana. Guided by Captain Zach LeBeouf, this tasty adventure will surely leave you hankering for more.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Follow the DCD crew as they head North to hunt with duck call maker Brad Eldrige. Despite tough hunting conditions brought on by a historic drought in Louisiana, the crew is able to knock down a “Tensas Limit” of wood ducks, mallards, honkers, and squirrels.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts begins the process of weaning and tagging fawns. Valor, an abandoned fawn lives through a horrible sickness and is released back to the herd. The new residence will receive their ear tags and begin adulthood.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts continues to wean and tag fawns. Arriving in the barn with their does and fawns, is a 200 inch named Bruce. A 7x7 typical that is Doug Roberts best whitetail he has raised in 26 years.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: SCI Flint Chapter Wish hunt is happening with 2 kids at High Rack Ranch of Michigan. Follow the story of Tyler and Carson as they take their dads hunting and hunt their first whitetail

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Antlers on ConQuest deer farm must be removed to ensure the safety of bucks fighting and killing each other. Watch how Doug Roberts selects only the best typical bucks for his breeding program.

programme.title: ConQuest 200

programme.title: ConQuest 200

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: There is a place in Florida that not many people have heard about. The Forgotten Coast, Ever heard of it? Didn’t think so. Let’s discover it together.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip

programme.title: Life On The Water

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton meets up with Tom Brewbaker as they fly down to Venice Louisiana to fish with Mike Frenette. Mike runs the Redfish Lodge of Louisiana and has over forty years of angling experience. programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: In Stomping Grounds Episode 5, our crew follows the road all the way down to where it ends on the tropical sun-baked island of Key West at the southern tip of the Florida Keys. Surrounded by water, Key West is a boater's paradise with historic seaports and marinas offering a bustling waterfront with historic schooners, dive boats, sport fishing charters, parasailing adventures and scenic coastal excursions. Host Ryan McVinney hops aboard a custom hybrid diesel-electric power catamaran with solar panels, called "Squid" for an in-depth eco-tour of Key West National Wildlife Refuge, including snorkeling in a sponge garden with tropical fish. Next a quick stop in Dry Tortugas National Park via the 110-foot Gladding Hearn power catamaran the "Yankee Freedom III" to visit historic Fort Jefferson, then we jump on a 2020 Sea Hunt 255 Ultra for a ride through the dolphin playground to a secret local boating spot known as Snipe Keys with pristine white sandbars. Back in town we we board the Nau Santa Maria - a replica of Christopher Columbus' sailboat. Finally we head 50 miles offshore to ply the wakes of the shrimp boats with fishing charter captain Chris Trosset aboard his Contender 35ST center console boat.

programme.title: Mr. Nanny

programme.title: The Spitfire Grill

programme.title: Sound of Thunder, A

programme.title: Stealing Home

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes and Woody Harrelson reteam here as foster brothers who, along with decoy Jennifer Lopez, have their eyes on a subway car full of cash.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: Based on the true story about how the game of football gave a group of boys at a juvenile detention center a sense of self-esteem and a second chance.

programme.title: Fast Getaway
programme.desc: A falling out within a bank robbing foursome splits up the group and pits a father and his 16-year-old son against their vengeful former partners.

programme.title: Slappy and the Stinkers

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: A tech geek expelled from school for pulling pranks on staff becomes the one person with enough savvy to rescue students from a gang of kidnappers.

programme.title: Emma's Chance
programme.desc: While doing community service at a horse rescue ranch, a girl forms an unlikely bond with an abused stallion that will not let anyone else ride him.

programme.title: The Princess & the Marine
programme.desc: Based on a true story about the forbidden love between a Mormon lance corporal and a Bahraini royal family member bound for an arranged marriage.

programme.title: Peggy Sue Got Married
programme.desc: An unhappy woman named Peggy Sue tries to change her future when she inadvertently travels back in time to her senior year of high school.

programme.title: North
programme.desc: After a judge allows him to sever ties to his work-obsessed parents, a boy embarks on an international quest for the quintessential set of parents.

programme.title: Immediate Family
programme.desc: An upscale couple unable to conceive arrange a brokered adoption with a pregnant woman who doesn’t hold up her end of the deal to give up the baby.

programme.title: Ice Castles

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: What begins as a casual chat turns into something more complex, as a romance blooms between a high school junior and a senior on his way to college.

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: When Donny shows up uninvited on the eve of his estranged son's wedding, he is forced to face the repercussions of his history of bad parenting.

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: Two mismatched partners, a pro boxer and a federal spy, must avoid international intrigue and deadly traps in order to get back an expensive jet.

programme.title: Blue Thunder
programme.desc: Classic ‘80s action film about a police pilot who learns that the futuristic helicopter he’s testing could cause hellish destruction on U.S. citizens.

programme.title: A Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: When an Arizona astronomer discovers a comet heading toward Earth, the president attempts to divert it by using a nuclear missile.

programme.title: Fatal Contact: Bird Flu in America
programme.desc: Follows an Avian Flu outbreak from its origins in a Hong Kong market through its mutation into a transmissible virus among humans around the world.

programme.title: Home Invasion
programme.desc: A botched robbery turns into a hostage crisis as a gang of armed criminals holds a woman and four children captive while police surround the house.

programme.title: Final Descent
programme.desc: When his aircraft collides with another plane in midair, Captain Glen "Lucky" Singer must try to save the lives of his 319 passengers.

programme.title: Final Run
programme.desc: On a family trip, Glen "Lucky" Singer must stop a train from careening toward disaster when an engineer's mistake causes a glitch in the controls.

programme.title: Runaway
programme.desc: A futuristic cop who works on broken robots discovers a plan to program them with artificial intelligence for murder, with his own son on the list.

programme.title: Solo
programme.desc: A powerful government killing machine with the appearance of a man carries out a series of missions. Soon, this being starts to grow a conscience.

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: A tech geek expelled from school for pulling pranks on staff becomes the one person with enough savvy to rescue students from a gang of kidnappers.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Pierre Bouelle novel about POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American officers plot to blow up the structure, but the commander of the bridge's construction has different plans.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: A World War II classic about the violence, quarrels, and romantic intrigue affecting a group of soldiers at Pearl Harbor before the tragic attack.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: This steamy pot-boiler follows the intrigues surrounding an escaped convict who attempts to return to the small southern town where he grew up.

programme.title: Affair in Trinidad
programme.desc: At the cost of damaging her relationship, a club dancer secretly works in cahoots with the cops to extract intel from a gang of international spies.

programme.title: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: In this suspenseful comedy, Nancy Troy (Loretta Young) and her mystery-author husband, Jeff (Brian Aherne), move into a dark basement apartment in New York City's Greenwich Village, in hopes of stirring up writing inspiration. When their neighbors begin acting oddly and one of them turns up dead, Nancy and Jeff must uncover a murder mystery in their own building, with a number of suspects lurking about, including the creepy Mrs. Devoe (Gale Sondergaard).

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: A war hero steps off a train and into a world of gambling, blackmail and murder while searching for a fellow vet who inexplicably disappeared himself.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: Based on the play by William Inge.

programme.title: Our Man in Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited as a spy by the British secret service. Despite his phony reports and lies, he quickly gains importance.

programme.title: Let's Do It Again!
programme.desc: In this 1953 musical remake of The Awful Truth, a recently-divorced couple try every way to make each other jealous.

programme.title: The Lone Wolf Takes a Chance
programme.desc: A former jewel thief (Warren William) is accused of murder after betting the police inspector that he can stay out of trouble for 24 hours.

programme.title: The Magic Carpet
programme.desc: When his parents, the caliph and queen, are murdered by usurper Ali (Gregory Gaye), the newborn Ramoth is delivered to the safety of his uncle, Ahkmid (William Fawcett), via a magic carpet. The adult Ramoth (John Agar) becomes masked hero the Scarlet Falcon. After tricking the reigning caliph into appointing him the royal physician, Ramoth learns of his noble birth and, with the help of faithful Razi (George Tobias) and beautiful Lida (Patricia Medina), he fights Ali and his wrathful minions.

programme.title: Divorce American Style
programme.desc: A nouveau-riche L.A. couple decide to call it quits after 17 years of marriage, but alimony woes send the bachelor in search of a husband for his ex.

programme.title: Meet the Stewarts
programme.desc: When a boy from modest means marries his rich, pampered finacé, squabbles over budget threaten to tear the lovebirds apart in this charming rom-com.

programme.title: You Can't Run Away From It
programme.desc: A spoiled heiress teams up with an enterprising reporter to escape her domineering father's plan of keeping her from getting married.

programme.title: Girls Can Play
programme.desc: A detective investigates the murder of a player on a professional girl's softball team.

programme.title: Beyond Mombasa
programme.desc: A hard-drinking American travels to East Africa to find out what happened to his uranium-miner brother and find the parties responsible for his murder.

programme.title: There's Always a Woman
programme.desc: An investigator for the district attorney and his amateur sleuth wife compete to solve a murder mystery behind the death of a woman's husband.

programme.title: All Ashore
programme.desc: When they finally get some shore leave, three sailors head to Catalina Island and try to meet girls while pretending to be entertainers.

programme.title: Harriet Craig
programme.desc: A cold, perfectionist wife will stop at nothing to have her house and life run as she wishes, even if it means controlling her husband's every move.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: After a volcano erupts on a South Sea island, a fallen priest and three convicts race to save the lives of children in a mountaintop leper colony.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Reporter Ben Munceford (Sidney Poitier) is aboard a U.S. Navy ship sailing near the Arctic Circle, on assignment to write a profile of Capt. Eric Finlander (Richard Widmark), a hardened anti-communist. Despite the concerns of Munceford, medical officer Chester Potter (Martin Balsam) and others on the ship, Finlander is shadowing a Soviet submarine on patrol in the same area, hoping to make it to surface. The cat-and-mouse game, however, turns deadly serious.

programme.title: Miss Sadie Thompson
programme.desc: In postwar Honolulu, a former sex worker finds herself courted by a love-struck Marine as a religious zealot sets his sights on reforming her.

programme.title: The Three Stooges in Orbit
programme.desc: When a pair of Martians steal a powerful submarine-tank-rocket military weapon from an inventor, the Three Stooges step in to try to save the day.

programme.title: How to Save a Marriage and Ruin Your Life
programme.desc: A dedicated bachelor takes it upon himself to save his best friend’s marriage by seducing his mistress, only to wind up in his own romantic conundrum.

programme.title: The Last Rebel
programme.desc: Two Confederates (Joe Namath, Jack Elam) save a man's (Woody Strode) life and cause trouble in 1865 Missouri.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wounded rancher (Randolph Scott) hides with a schoolmarm (Ellen Drew) after his ex-girlfriend's husband (Alexander Knox) runs him out of town.

programme.title: J.W. Coop
programme.desc: After spending a decade behind bars for writing bad checks and punching a cop, former rodeo star J.W. Coop (Cliff Robertson) re-enters a world drastically different from how he left it; the only constant seems to be his mother (Geraldine Page). Gradually coming to terms with societal changes and cultural norms, Coop is determined to climb back to the top spot on the rodeo circuit. Along the way, he hooks up with Bean (Cristina Ferrare), a liberated woman who helps him catch up to modern life.

programme.title: Count Three and Pray
programme.desc: After fighting for the Union during the Civil War, Luke Fargo (Van Heflin) is greeted with resentment when he returns home to his small southern town. Luke has a reputation as a rogue, but he's reinvented himself as a man of God and plans to fix up the town's damaged church. Recalling their romantic past, Georgina Decrais (Allison Hayes) tries to reclaim Luke. But, to the dismay of some suspicious townspeople, he concentrates on mentoring an unsophisticated young woman, Lissy (Joanne Woodward).

programme.title: Scalplock
programme.desc: A frontier gambler (Dale Robertson) wins a railroad in a card game and has to keep it going as people try to take it away from him.

programme.title: Santa Fe
programme.desc: Three brothers become outlaws after the Civil War, while a fourth sibling goes to work for the railroad.

programme.title: The Doolins of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Old West outlaw Bill Doolin (Randolph Scott) marries a deacon's wife, but his gang will not leave him alone.

programme.title: The Outlaws Is Coming
programme.desc: Moe, Larry and Curly Joe (Adam West) bring their head-knocking, eye-gouging antics to the Wild West. When reporter Kenneth Cabot (Nancy Kovack) heads to Wyoming to stop the slaughter of buffaloes, he brings the stooges with him. There, they trade barbs with Billy the Kid, Jesse James and Wild Bill Hickock, while Cabot gets elected town sheriff. But they'll need some help from Annie Oakley (Mort Mills) when it comes to foiling the criminal plans of a land-hungry frontier villain.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: Alvarez Kelly (William Holden) is a Mexican cattle rancher who is doing his best to stay out of the Civil War. He has no interest in which side may win or lose -- Kelly is far more concerned about his own survival, and about making money. He soon finds himself in the middle of the conflict, however, when a confederate colonel (Richard Widmark) captures the rancher and forces Kelly to help his soldiers steal a nearby herd of cattle, which they desperately need for food.

programme.title: The Longest Drive
programme.desc: After a decade apart, a pair of brothers reunites to find their long-lost sister, who was kidnapped as a child and is now living with a native tribe.

programme.title: The Walking Hills
programme.desc: During a poker game in a Mexican bar, a group of men discover the location of a lost wagon train -- and its cargo of gold. To prevent one man from cheating the rest, it's decided that they will find it together. Among them are horse breeder Jim Carey (Randolph Scott) and rodeo rider Shep Wilson (William Bishop) ; like their cohorts in the treasure hunt, they share a tangled history -- Chris Jackson (Ella Raines), Shep's current sweetheart, is Jim's old flame. Greed and suspicion soon break out.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Phantom Stagecoach
programme.desc: A dispute between stage lines ends with a steel-armored stagecoach.

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: A federal agent (George Montgomery) and two colleagues infiltrate a gang of gold-rush gold smugglers.

programme.title: The Desperadoes
programme.desc: Sheriff Steve Upton (Randolph Scott) is a devoted lawman who works tirelessly to keep order in his small town, nestled within the Utah territory. So, when Cheyenne Rogers (Glenn Ford), an old friend with a criminal past, rolls into town, Upton is immediately on edge. Cheyenne assures his pal that all that's behind him now. But when the town bank is robbed, Cheyenne becomes the locals' number one suspect. He'll have to prove his innocence to save himself and his friend's reputation.

programme.title: They Came to Cordura
programme.desc: On a mission to Mexico, U.S. Maj. Tom Thorn (Gary Cooper) is branded a coward, while several of his fellow servicemen are praised for showing bravery. Tom is asked to transport the heroes through harsh terrain so they can be honored. Also along for the journey is Adelaide Geary (Rita Hayworth), a woman charged with conspiring against the United States. But, as his fellow soldiers begin revealing their treacherous sides, Tom realizes that Adelaide is the only heroic one of the bunch.

programme.title: Face of a Fugitive
programme.desc: While being escorted to jail, bank robber Jim Larson (Fred MacMurray) manages to get the upper hand on his captor and escape. Jim is surprised to see his brother appear on the scene, ready to aid his sibling. As they make their getaway, his brother and the pursuing lawman shoot each other, leaving the stunned Jim alone and on the run. Assuming a different identity, Jim travels to a mining town and befriends the local sheriff (Lin McCarthy), hoping to start over and find redemption.

programme.title: The Last Rebel
programme.desc: Two Confederates (Joe Namath, Jack Elam) save a man's (Woody Strode) life and cause trouble in 1865 Missouri.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wounded rancher (Randolph Scott) hides with a schoolmarm (Ellen Drew) after his ex-girlfriend's husband (Alexander Knox) runs him out of town.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: Major Matt Stewart (Randolph Scott) leads a troop of Confederate soldiers on a raid, targeting a wagon that is transporting Union gold. All of the Union soldiers are killed except for one, who informs Stewart that the war had already ended a month ago. Stewart leads the troop into hiding, knowing they could face murder charges. After capturing a coach driven by nurse Molly Hull (Donna Reed), the soldiers try to evade a group of bandits chasing them to steal the gold.

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: Returning to Fort Lincoln, Capt. Benson learns of Custer's defeat at the Little Big Horn. At the inquiry as Custer's officers blame Custer for the defeat, Benson tries to defend him. However, Benson was suspiciously absent at the time of the battle and is now despised by the troops. So when an order to retrieve the bodies from the battlefield arrives, Benson volunteers for the dangerous mission of returning back into Indian territory.

programme.title: Masterson of Kansas
programme.desc: In the 1870s, Marshal Wyatt Earp (Bruce Cowling) calls upon Dodge City, Kan., Sheriff Bat Masterson (George Montgomery) to track down rancher Merrick (John Maxwell), who is accused of murder. But, thanks to some proof held by local Native American Chief Yellow Hawk (Jay Silverheels), Masterson realizes Merrick might be the victim of a frame-up. So, with the help of Earp and gunfighter Doc Holliday (James Griffith), Masterson sets out to find those who are really behind the killing.

programme.title: California Conquest
programme.desc: A Spanish swashbuckler (Cornel Wilde) and a gunsmith's daughter (Teresa Wright) oppose a Russian plot to annex California.

programme.title: Reprisal!
programme.desc: Frank Madden (Guy Madison), who is part Native American but passes as white, purchases a ranch in the small town of Kendall, Okla. When Frank moves in, he finds that the bigoted townspeople have recently let three brothers, who are also his neighbors, get away with the lynching murder of innocent Native Americans. As tensions between the townspeople and local Native Americans rise, Hank becomes torn between fighting against injustice and keeping his true identity a secret.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: During the end of the Civil War, Major Dundee guards Confederate prisoners, Union deserters and ordinary hard-bitten criminals in a remote fort. When Apaches attack the fort and make off with three children, Dundee must set up a posse including Confederates, who face a choice between joining up or being shot. The feud between Dundee and Tyreen is also heated up by a sultry Mexican widow.

programme.title: Like A Country Song
programme.desc: After meeting his father (Billy Ray Cyrus) for the first time, an up-and-coming country singer (Joel Smallbone) tries to rebuild what he has ruined.

programme.title: Stagecoach: The Texas Jack Story
programme.desc: After retiring from his life as an outlaw, ranch owner Nathaniel Reed (Trace Adkins) quietly leads an honest existence with his devoted wife, Laura Lee.

programme.title: War Flowers

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and new detective Charlie Nelson moves into Midsomer. He's thrown straight into an intriguing mystery in the village of Morton Shallows. A man is fatally stabbed with an antique sword during a ghost-hunting party at a "haunted" manor house. Can Barnaby and Nelson find a more earthly motive behind the murder and trap the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A series of murders in Midsomer St Claire seem to be inspired by macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt. As the village prepares for storms and flooding it appears that someone is using ancient torture methods to punish modern-day "sinners". But who is responsible and why?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to restaurant Wyvern House and its tyrannical celebrity chef Ruth Cameron. Secrets from the past surface and the killer strikes again - but the poison spreads wider than its intended target.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a body is discovered in a reservoir dropped out of a plane, Barnaby and Nelson find the world of stunt pilots and military heroes hides many dark secrets. Are campaigners against the local airfield behind Bernard King's murder or does it link back to a tragic story from World War Two?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives, the abrasive and astute Poulsen and the charming and cool Degn. They discover Eric Calder had more linking him to Copenhagen than just his famous Golden Clusters.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy landowner Gregory Lancaster's body goes missing on the night of his death, a sinister web of secrets and lies is exposed in the village of Little Malton. DCI Barnaby, DS Nelson and new Forensic Pathologist Kam Karimore are drawn into a macabre world of body-snatching as they seek to identify the villain.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Mysterious lights are seen in the sky over famous UFO hot-spot Cooper Hill. When a local forest-ranger suffers a strange death the visiting UFO spotters are convinced aliens are responsible. DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson unearth suspicions, betrayals and long-buried secrets in their search for the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An international cycling competition comes to the Midsomer village of Burwood Mantle. When the race leader is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson find themselves drawn into a ruthlessly competitive world of blackmail, bribery and bloodshed where winning comes at any cost.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Art comes to the picturesque Midsomer village of Angel's Rise with the opening of a new Sculpture Park. But when its launch is marred by murder, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson have to get creative to crack a case where art imitates death, and everything has a deeper meaning.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The discovery of a Saint's bones at an archaeological dig causes a stir in the village of Midsomer Cicely. But when the leader of the dig is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson soon realise that it's not only skeletons that have been long buried in the hallowed ground.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The annual fair and the daredevil riders of the Wall of Death come to Midsomer village Whitcombe Mallet. When the owner of an equestrian centre is trampled by his horse DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson have to unravel a complex feud from the past, where nothing is what it seems...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Peter and Caroline Cave are house-hunting in Midsomer Newton. Shortly before leaving their hotel they mention they haven't been able to find what they're looking for; "something old and derelict that they can do up." Anne Merrick tells them about Winyard, a tumbledown cottage in the woods, might be for sale. At the estate agents they are told the house is not yet available for viewing. Later that evening they find the house on their own. However, Caroline has read up on the cottage's haunted reputation and only reluctantly explores it with Peter. The next morning they are found strangled in their own car. DCI Barnaby starts the investigation with the help of PC Ben Jones and they come across the world of estate agents, identical twins, ghosts, piano wire, and more before another body turns up.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers of Midsomer Barton are all set to celebrate Oak Apple Week, especially as the carnival queen event is set to return after an eight year absence. Yet the body of the mother of a deceased, one-time carnival queen, found in a stream, looks set to spoil things, as Barnaby and Jones find themselves digging up the past. From familiar faces, to drunken boasts and hidden obessions, it slowly becomes clear that the mother's daughter might be the key to solving the murder, when more deaths follow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Wealthy, eccentric and obese aristocrat Freddy Butler drops dead, shortly after gathering all three of his wives at Haddington Hall to make an announcement. Although George Bullard is adamant his death is from natural causes, the case is far from simple when Freddy's solicitor is deliberately killed in a house fire shortly afterwards and Freddy's will goes missing. Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating the extended Butler family, uncovering hidden secrets, illegitimate children and elusive treasure in the process.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Martin Barrett, a local council clerk living in Midsomer Worthy, is murdered during the night by shotgun, prompting Barnaby and Jones to find a motive for his murder. When they discover that Barrett was an expert blackmailer, his victims become prime suspects for his death - from a local pub landlord, a cleaner, a prominent member of the police board, to a former marine geologist. As they investigate, finding themselves drawn to the seaside, they slowly uncover deception, theft, attempted blackmail and hatred.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Broughton, a ninety-year-old battle of the sexes has often occurred, with men trying to oppose an event that the women have managed to successfully hold without interruption, until it culminates with casualties on both sides - Mildred Danvers, an elderly woman who had returned on the day of a funeral and poisoned in her hotel room, and Rev. Anthony Gant, shot during a major event being held in the village green, in view of many. It soon becomes clear someone may have wished to kill both to cover up a dark truth, and soon Barnaby has to figure out who amongst the village wanted both dead, complicated further when Gant's curate is murdered next.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers in Elverton-cum-Latterly are up in arms and divided, over the building of a supermarket. Things soon come to a head when independent environmental supervisor, Frank Hopkirk, is found stabbed to death at a Jubb's Timber Yard, the site of the new supermarket, by a pair of children. When Barnaby and Jones investigate to determine who wanted Hopkirk dead, they find out that he secretly came to the village under various aliases for sexual rendezvous with various women in fantasy role-playing scenarios, and that he had been making further investigations on the future development site and having doubts over claims it was contaminated. Either someone didn't like his investigations, or someone didn't like his sexual appetite, but either way, Barnaby finds himself investigating lies and more to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and DC Ben Jones (Jason Hughes) find themselves attempting to unravel the deaths of a choir tenor, and later a bird watcher, before more murders occur. The case is complicated by a rivalry between the Midsomer Worthy and Aston Wherry choirs, due to compete in an upcoming competition, and suspicions that an art scam is to be conducted, and soon Barnaby and Jones become concerned about a local woman, who they fear may become a victim herself. Particularly when it becomes clear the bird watcher had been photographing suspicious activity of late.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A few months ago, Annie Woodrow was arrested, accused of murdering her friend, Frances Trevelyan, on the motive of wanting Frances' husband. Her time in court has come, but DCI Barnaby is certain she still is holding things back in regards to the murder, and decides to monitor the trial. Yet a chance remark by Frances' youngest daughter, and a meeting with an old friend and psychiatrist, makes him begin to doubt the evidence for her conviction. Soon he and DC Jones, awaiting news of his promotion to DS, find themselves reinvestigating the case, and it soon becomes clear that they may have missed details that could implicate another in the murder.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Plans by Barnaby to renew his wedding vows at the church of St Michael's in Badger's Drift, are quickly put on hold when the body of Richard Bayly, a local developer, is found decapitated in his own home. The detective is left mystified as to why anyone would kill a man who had only been given weeks to live, after being recently diagnosed with a brain tumour. As he and Troy attempt to find out, they soon encounter a hotbed of corruption and property feuding occurring within the village as the body count rises and the mystery deepens.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Carla Constanza - the face of Brazil's leading cigarette brand for Monarch Tobacco - is found strangled in the infamous Strangler's Wood, Barnaby and Troy not only find themselves investigating her murder, but three identical unsolved murders of innocent girls from eight years before.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Cully's latest boyfriend, Nico, decides to shadow Troy in preparation for a TV role he recently got, but gets more hands-on experience than he expected when investigations into a slashed painting at a museum in Aspern Tallow, a 17th century portrait of Royalist Jonathan Lowrie, are overshadowed by the murder of his descendant, Marcus Lowrie. It isn't long before Barnaby and Troy, with Nico's assistance, find themselves dealing with mysterious, ghostly events, escaped criminals, and a museum trustee who has more to them than meets the eye.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Hector Bridges, a local magistrate, is infuriated when one of his geese is stolen, just as two bands of travellers arrive in Martyr Warren. Although Barnaby and Troy are called in to deal with the theft and later dissuade him from forcefully evicting the travellers from the village, they soon have a murder on their hands, when a short while later Bridges is killed with his own shotgun. It quickly transpires that many in the village had hated the magistrate, who lied, bullied, and committed many an injustice, leaving the detectives determined to find who among them had pulled the trigger after Bridges pushed them past their breaking point.

programme.title: Super Sleuths - Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Murders team opens up about their experience of working on the popular crime drama and provides insight into the overall process of bringing it to the small screen.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: New DCI John Barnaby arrives in Midsomer and is bemused by the quaint villages and their quirky residents. But when a local DJ is crushed to death at a traditional girls' boarding school, he soon discovers that murder and deception are never far away. As the death toll rises, could Barnaby's first case also be his last?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The reclusive lives of elderly eccentrics William and Mary Bingham (Edward Fox and Phyllida Law) comes under police scrutiny when a social services investigator (Jeff Rawle) is murdered. Barnaby and Jones must unearth generations of family secrets and decipher astronomical charts to find the killer.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: With the season winding down, the pressure heats up. Dave returns from jail but may not have a job to come back to, Shelby hunts his biggest catch of the season.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: With only two weeks remaining in the season, the mountain is turned upside down. Browning bounces back, while Rygaard suffers a devastating loss.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: It's an all-out fight to the finish for Browning and Rygaard, as Gabe mounts a last minute surprise comeback. Shelby vows revenge on the lake log, and at Conner.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The fourth season of Ax Men returns and this year, the stakes are higher than ever.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Rygaard tries to tame two monsters at the same time--the super-juiced Mean Bean and the downhill site on which it's deployed. Pihl's greenhorn must prove herself to the crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: On the edge of America's final frontier, it's every logger's worst nightmare: one of Papac Alaska's men has disappeared into thin air.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: At Papac Alaska, time is running out for missing logger Van Huffman. At Rygaard, Gabe gambles on a helicopter... and loses.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: It's a battle for survival in logging country. In Bayou country, Shelby's nighttime mission brings him face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Logging country is turned upside down when one of the mountain's best bows out. At Papac Alaska, the men suffer under the reign of a new yarder operator.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Tonight, logging country is teetering on the edge. At Rygaard, Gabe lands on the wrong end of a volatile log pile.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Rygaard tries to tame two monsters at the same time--the super-juiced Mean Bean and the downhill site on which it's deployed. Pihl's greenhorn must prove herself to the crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: On the edge of America's final frontier, it's every logger's worst nightmare: one of Papac Alaska's men has disappeared into thin air.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: At Papac Alaska, time is running out for missing logger Van Huffman. At Rygaard, Gabe gambles on a helicopter... and loses.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars look to buy an American off-roading motorcycle classic--a 1967 Rokon Trailbreaker.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Is the old man sleeping or just resting his eyes? Whatever it is, Rick orders quiet in the pawn shop, as they bargain over a colt revolver, coffee machine, presidential pins and a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars are presented with a classic 1946 Seeburg Jukebox. Will the gang tune up their wallets and hit a high note of a deal, or will it become the day the music died?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars are blown away when they meet a guy selling his homemade mortar that fires a very unique brand of ammunition--bowling balls.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars look to purchase top-secret maps and battle plans for Iwo Jima. Will the gang storm the beach for this strategic piece of World War II history or will they be out-gunned and forced to retreat?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars meet a man hoping to sell a mysterious coin from the 1800's believed to be from George Washington's funeral.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Old Man has an opportunity to buy lost footage of legendary President Franklin Delano Roosevelt. Can he muster the money for this 8mm piece of White House history or will this film end up on the cutting room floor?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have an opportunity to buy a huge gold bar believed to be from a 1500s shipwreck. Will the gang dig in and strike it rich or will they end up on a fool's errand?

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers go south to Laguna Nigel, California. This time it's Dave who doesn't buy. Jarrod and Brandi uncover rare depression era art. Barry's art goes a little further back, to the Mayan culture.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: They say Las Vegas can make or break you overnight. But when the sun comes up, the real gamblers go to work. The Storage Warriors press their luck at a marathon of auctions.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to the upscale retirement community of Laguna Hills, California. Dave wins a furniture unit that points him in the direction of Chinatown. Jarrod and Brandi take a trip down memory lane.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Since the Port of Long Beach, Calif., boasts high-end imports but low-income housing, the buyers know they can either go boom or bust today. When the storage units finally swing open, they reveal surfing and cowboy items, maintenance equipment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: When the auction action goes to Homeland, Calif., an upscale retirement community, the bidders start to dream of scoring big. Darrell lands a locker filled with furniture, and Jarrod gambles on a safe. Have they bought treasure--or trash?

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Welcome to the eerie side of storage. When Barry hires two psychics to "see" inside the units at Gardena, Calif., they say they've got a "dark" feeling about the place. But that doesn't spook Jarrod and Brandi.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to the wealthy beach neighborhood of Westminster, CA. Darrell Sheets brings his bravado and a wad of cash, and leaves with both of them intact. Dave Hester finds classic car parts.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Norwalk, California--a Los Angeles suburb with a small town feel. Stashed away in these lockers is the potential for collectables, heirlooms, and other forgotten jewels.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In the college town of Fullerton, California the buyers search for textbooks and rare university artifacts. Dave and Darrell compete in a mano-a-mano showdown.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers venture into Downtown, Los Angeles, where they find themselves in a new kind of auction, called a vault auction. It's pallets and crates instead of lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: When the locks are blasted off the storage doors in a California town rich in historic Spanish-American culture, our intrepid buyers discover an unusual mannequin phone, a bootlegger's moonshine still, and some enticing office equipment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Things are up and down for the buyers as they head to Upland, California. Barry brings an advantage, but winds up going a little cuckoo. Darrell gets shut out all together.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The auction turns into a three-ring circus as the buyers head to Irvine, California. Tensions finally boil over between "The Mogul" and "The Young Gun." Barry heads to the big top, dreaming of a big lick.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head back to Santa Ana, California and the reunion is anything but fruitful. Jarrod and Brandi quickly see their profits roll away. Barry becomes an organ donor.

programme.desc: Mike and Frank visit a New York collector who's filled a train station with vintage cars, and although the cars are hot, the prices cool their engines.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike dives into an amazing Michigan collection but Frank seems to have lost his mojo. The guys visit an incredible Wisconsin property that features a reconstituted vintage town.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys are in Kentucky, and they're driving Danielle crazy. Whenever she comes up with a new lead, they toss a coin to decide whether or not they'll go.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank head to Ohio and decide to make the trip a little more interesting by bringing along a cup dispenser.

programme.desc: While picking in Pennsylvania, Danielle sends the guys to Bushkill Park--a century-old amusement park that's seen much better days.

programme.desc: Danielle is jealous when the guys take Mike's young nephew on his first pick instead of her. But 12-year-old Rhesa is thrilled.

programme.desc: Welcome to the eerie side of storage. When Barry hires two psychics to "see" inside the units at Gardena, Calif., they say they've got a "dark" feeling about the place. But that doesn't spook Jarrod and Brandi.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to the wealthy beach neighborhood of Westminster, CA. Darrell Sheets brings his bravado and a wad of cash, and leaves with both of them intact. Dave Hester finds classic car parts.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Norwalk, California--a Los Angeles suburb with a small town feel. Stashed away in these lockers is the potential for collectables, heirlooms, and other forgotten jewels.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In the college town of Fullerton, California the buyers search for textbooks and rare university artifacts. Dave and Darrell compete in a mano-a-mano showdown.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers venture into Downtown, Los Angeles, where they find themselves in a new kind of auction, called a vault auction. It's pallets and crates instead of lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: When the locks are blasted off the storage doors in a California town rich in historic Spanish-American culture, our intrepid buyers discover an unusual mannequin phone, a bootlegger's moonshine still, and some enticing office equipment.

programme.desc: Things are up and down for the buyers as they head to Upland, California. Barry brings an advantage, but winds up going a little cuckoo. Darrell gets shut out all together.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The auction turns into a three-ring circus as the buyers head to Irvine, California. Tensions finally boil over between "The Mogul" and "The Young Gun." Barry heads to the big top, dreaming of a big lick.
